5.1. Errors¶

class pytablewriter.EmptyTableNameError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Raised when a table writer class of the table_name attribute is empty and the writer is not permitted empty table_name.

class pytablewriter.EmptyHeaderError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Raised when a table writer class of the header_list attribute is empty and the writer is not permitted empty header_list.

class pytablewriter.EmptyValueError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Raised when a table writer class of the value_matrix attribute is empty.
